articles.author: Ashley Van Sant
articles.title: Virginia technology company to pay civil penalty over discriminatory ‘Whites only’ job posting, according to DOJ - CNN
articles.description: A Virginia company, Arthur Grand Technologies Inc., will pay a $7,500 civil penalty after being fined by the Department of Justice over a discriminatory job posting.
articles.content:
A Virginia company will pay a $7,500 civil penalty after being fined by the Department of Justice over a discriminatory job posting.
According to the DOJ, in March of 2023, Arthur Grand Technologies… [+2939 chars]

articles.title: Iyo thinks its gen AI earbuds can succeed where Humane and Rabbit stumbled - TechCrunch
articles.description: Iyo represents a third form factor in the push to deliver standalone generative AI devices: Bluetooth earbuds.
articles.content: A month after launching its first product, Humanes co-founders have reportedly put their well-funded startup on the market. While even the firms biggest cheerleaders didnt expect the Ai Pin to change… [+5608 chars]
